fb_greeting_short: Hi! Do you have any questions?
fb_greeting: Hi! Do you have any questions? Log in with Facebook and put them down!
message_success: We have received your message, thank you!
error_form: Sorry, an error occurred while sending your message.
already_subscribed: You are already on ADEPT's mailing list.
success_subscribe: You have been successfully added to ADEPT's mailing list.
welcome_msg: ADEPT is the association of Cégep Édouard-Montpetit's Computer Science students.
welcome_sub: Come and see us, we are in room F-045 located in the cafeteria!
mission_txt_1: ADEPT is one of the largest student organizations in Cégep Édouard-Montpetit
mission_txt_2: and we do our best to be the one who best supports its members!
community_txt: The association brings together all computer science students to build a dynamic community and foster a spirit of cooperation within the program.
rights_txt: We represent all our members within AGECEM in order to defend their rights from a physical, moral, social, intellectual and educational point of view.
promote_txt: We help promote CEGEP's CS program by organizing activities such as the LAN and by providing information on the subject.
am_i_member_txt: If you are enrolled in a computer science program at Cégep Édouard-Montpetit, you are a member of ADEPT!
local_txt: Our room is a perfect place to dine, relax or meet new people of the program. Besides, we have a microwave! You are therefore welcome to your breaks and during dinner!
lan_txt: We organize each session a LAN party: a network gaming event that takes place right here at the CEGEP and brings together video game enthusiasts from all over Quebec!
hoodies_txt: Once every session you'll have the chance to buy an official and awesome hoodie reserved for the members of the program! Plus, it's super comfortable! More details here.
fridge_txt_1: If you're in a hurry or don't want to wait in line at the cafeteria, that's good because we have a full fridge to help you out! Many
computers_txt: No labs available? No problem, our computers are equipped with the same software as the department's computers. So you can continue your work without any worries!
discord_server_txt: Join our Discord server where students of the program are gathered to help each other and have fun together.
lan_ad: Le LAN de l'ADEPT is a biannual event that takes place during the study week of Cégep Édouard-Montpetit. Launched by a small group of 20 people in 2014 and improved each year, the event now brings together nearly 250 video game enthusiasts from across Quebec each session!
adept_bad_joke_3: You'll see, trying it is ADEPTing it !
admins_txt: Here are the members of the Administrative Council who are in charge for this session.
admins_txt_2: Don't hesitate to talk to them or ask them questions, they are here to help you!
mdc_header: Do you want to get involved? Become a trusted member!
mdc_desc: Trusted members have privileged access to the association's premises and are responsible for ensuring its supervision when no administrator is present.
contact_txt: The best way to contact us is to come and see us in person directly in the room F-045 just next to the cafeteria!
contact_opt: Otherwise, here are some other ways to contact us:

footer.address:
945 Chambly Road, Longueuil
room F-045, CEM,
Québec, Canada
footer.newsletter_txt: Sign up to receive news of our events and activities!
footer.opensource: This website is open-source. Thanks to all those who have contributed !

mconfiances.success: Your application has been successfully submitted!
mconfiances.error: An error has occurred! Please try again.
mconfiances.mdc_lead:
You are an active member of ADEPT and you want to get involved in the association?
You could become a trusted member
mconfiances.mdc_desc: Trusted members have privileged access to the local. They can use the floating key to access it at any time. On the other hand, the trusted members are responsible of the local when no member of the administrative council is present.
mconfiances.mdc_criterias_title: Here are the main criteria for selecting trusted members :
mconfiances.mdc_criterias_list:
• Be a member of the association for at least one session
  • Be an active member and visit the local regularly
  • Be motivated and willing to get involved with the association
  • Be nice to the administrators ;)
  • Getting along with everyone
mconfiances.mdc_limited: Since we can only appoint a limited number of trusted members at each session, we will make a selection from the applications received based on these criteria and the answers to the registration questionnaire on the following page.
mconfiances.mdc_form_lead: To register as a candidate, simply answer this form!
mconfiances.mdc_form_hint: Answer each question as best you can! If you don't know one of the answers, try something

hoodies_mod.title: ADEPT Hoodies have arrived!
hoodies_mod.desc:
Interested by an ADEPT hoodie? It is time to place your order for session A18!

Hoodie costs $40 (taxes included) and a supplement is applicable for sizes larger than XL.
Please note that a deposit of at least $20 will be required before sending your order to our supplier...
hoodies_mod.subtitle: This year, the hoodie is available in 3 colors!
hoodies_mod.rsv_ended:
The hoodies reservation period is now over.
For more information, please contact an ADEPT admin.
hoodies_mod.email_dsc:
Please provide us a valid email address.
This information is required to contact you when your order is ready to be picked up
hoodies_mod.try: I'll try the sizes at ADEPT.

shop_mod.title: Self-Financing
shop_mod.list_intro: Here is a list of products available at our local(F-045)!
shop_mod.shop_info: In order to organize events such as the LAN and to improve the layout of our local, the ADEPT offers its members (and all visitors) a self-financing program. We offer you a wide selection of low-cost gourmet snacks and meals that, of course, follow the recommendations of Canada's Food Guide! What's good for you, as a member, is that all the profits go directly back to the association and so in some ways to yourself!
